Literally been asked to be scarier & ruder. There's no better combination to scare Western corps than being smart, young, Chinese, female.

And I have been asked several times to audition for roles which IDENTIFY "the Chinese" and China as the baddie. This is NO JOKE no more.

If you can't go, do not be unkind to yourself but perhaps there is some way you can support this and speak out? Look after each other.
If you're going on your own, know you can always leave or hang out on the fringes, and that smiling at someone on their way there helps.
If you're going, do let your anxiety-ridden pals know you are available for hugs and hand holding. It really helps!
